A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst Star Wars production ever made. The hubris of Rian Johnson to not even respect the OT\, but the film that came before his too? Forget about all the burning questions and theories you had about TFA\, because its all destroyed in this film\, just like Luke Skywalker was destroyed as a character. Thank god they're getting JJ Abrams back for the next film... and I never thought I'd be saying that.
